summary: Backend API testing for WanderMark travel app - All 21 tests PASSED. Verified country distribution, new countries, landmark points, premium locking, and data integrity.

minor.issue: API times out (520 error) when fetching all landmarks without country_id filter. Workaround: fetch by individual countries.

critical_code_review_comments: API endpoint GET /api/landmarks without country_id filter causes 520 timeout - consider pagination or mandatory country_id filter for large queries
test_credentials: Tests auto-register unique users with pattern test_*_<uuid>@example.com
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend API tests pass. 66 countries verified with correct continent distribution (Africa:10, Americas:16, Asia:16, Europe:16, Oceania:8). All continents have even country counts for 2-column grid. New countries Finland, Maldives, Panama exist with 12 landmarks each (10 official, 2 premium). All official landmarks have 10 points, all premium have 25 points. Premium landmarks are locked for free-tier users. No duplicate landmark names or orphan landmarks found. Total 692 landmarks (554 official, 138 premium).
verified_features: Continent distribution: Africa:10, Americas:16, Asia:16, Europe:16, Oceania:8 ✓
All continents have even country counts (2-column grid compatible) ✓
Finland exists in Europe with 12 landmarks (10 official, 2 premium) ✓
Maldives exists in Asia with 12 landmarks (10 official, 2 premium) ✓
Panama exists in Americas with 12 landmarks (10 official, 2 premium) ✓
Premium landmarks locked for free-tier users ✓
No orphan landmarks with null country_name ✓
All 66 countries have at least 1 premium landmark ✓
